### ‚úÖ Checklist: Reviewer's Guide

Before merging, the reviewer should ensure the following have been addressed:

- [ ] **Self-Review:** I have performed a self-review of my own code and logic.

- [ ] **Dependencies:** Any necessary new dependencies have been checked and documented.
